name: Avocado Toast with Tomato
description: A simple and nutritious avocado toast topped with fresh tomatoes, perfect for a healthy snack.
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread slices.
Mash the avocado and spread it evenly over the toast.
Top with tomato slices, and season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.
cookingNote: For extra flavor, add a pinch of red pepper flakes or a squeeze of lemon juice.

name: Chia Pudding with Berries
description: A creamy chia pudding topped with fresh berries for a delicious and healthy snack.
instructions: Combine chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
Stir well, cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Top with mixed berries before serving.
cookingNote: This pudding can be prepared the night before for an easy breakfast or snack.

name: Hummus and Veggie Sticks
description: A tasty and filling snack with hummus and a variety of fresh vegetable sticks.
instructions: Arrange the vegetable sticks on a plate.
cookingNote: You can substitute hummus with guacamole or yogurt dip for variety.

name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Almonds
description: A healthy snack combining creamy Greek yogurt, honey, and crunchy almonds.
instructions: Scoop Greek yogurt into a bowl.
Drizzle with honey, and top with sliced almonds.
cookingNote: For added flavor, you can use maple syrup instead of honey or add fresh fruit on top.

name: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
description: A quick and satisfying snack with crunchy apple slices and creamy almond butter.
instructions: Spread almond butter on each slice.
cookingNote: You can also use peanut butter instead of almond butter for a different taste.
